headline: PTC Stock Outlook: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: While PTC has lagged behind to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: PTC Stock Outlook: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
raw.summary: While PTC has lagged behind to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: PTC FlexPLM to Strengthen SPG Company's Licensed Product Operations
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that SPG Company, a global leader in licensed product design, development, manufacturing, and distribution, has selected PTC's FlexPLM® retail product lifecycle management (PLM) solution to modernize and support its end-to-end product lifecycle operations. With FlexPLM, SPG will replace its legacy PLM system with a scalable, cloud-based platform designed to support faster development cycles and more consistent product data.

With FlexPLM, SPG will replace its legacy PLM system with a scalable, cloud-based platform designed to support faster development cycles and more consistent product data.
